holidays.title: Selena Day
holidays.description: Play your favorite Selena songs and remember the incredible impact the Tejano crooner had on music.

holidays.title: Wear Pajamas to Work Day
holidays.description: We always recommend checking with the boss first — unless you're working from home.

holidays.title: Birthday of Jose de Diego
holidays.description: Celebrate the Birthday of Jose de Diego, whose teachings inspired people to strive for freedom.

holidays.title: Day of the Mushroom
holidays.description: Let’s go truffle-hunting; it’s Day of the Mushroom today! Celebrate with us!

holidays.title: Foursquare Day
holidays.description: Take your first step to meeting new people and making lasting connections on Foursquare Day.

holidays.title: National Angel Day
holidays.description: To our divinely named human beings, on this day, we celebrate you, Angel!

holidays.title: National Bean Counter Day
holidays.description: Join in as we celebrate the professionals who take care of our financial wellbeing.

holidays.title: National Cash Day
holidays.description: Take a look at the history of the name Cash and its rise to popularity.

holidays.title: National Eggs Benedict Day
holidays.description: Poached eggs, English muffins, and Canadian bacon covered in Hollandaise sauce and surrounded by a misconception.

holidays.title: National Healthcare Decisions Day
holidays.description: Prepare your minds as we observe a day that helps us make vital health choices.

holidays.title: National Joseph Day
holidays.description: To all the Joes around the world, you are far from average, and this one’s for you!

holidays.title: National Orchid Day
holidays.description: Ready your hearts in celebration of this special day to honor and remember lost loved ones.

holidays.title: National Reveal the Genius Within Day
holidays.description: Get ready to share your ideas with our tips and information about this day!

holidays.title: Save the Elephant Day
holidays.description: Save the Elephant Day aims to sensitize people to the plight of elephants.

holidays.title: Teach Your Daughter to Volunteer Day
holidays.description: Voluntary service is a way to assist others and give back to society.

holidays.title: World Semicolon Day
holidays.description: It’s time to learn a bit more about mental health and anti-suicide campaigns.

holidays.title: WORLD VOICE DAY
holidays.description: Make some noise; it’s time for World Voice Day! Celebrate with us, right here!

holidays.title: Akon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This incredible artist, rapper, and singer has produced chart-topping hits for years.

holidays.title: Alyssa Hyde’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube star has made an impact in her home town and her fame keeps growing.

holidays.title: Anya Taylor-Joy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star is not only a talented actress but a source of inspiration to girls worldwide.

holidays.title: Chance The Rapper’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented Grammy award-winning rapper, and songwriter, life is all about chance.

holidays.title: Charlie Chaplin’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was a one-of-a-kind actor, filmmaker, and director whose works are remembered decades after his death.

holidays.title: Martin Lawrence’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented American actor still brings smiles to people’s faces when he appears on screen.

holidays.title: Sadie Sink’s Birthday
holidays.description: This American actress and model is not only gorgeous but super talented as well.

holidays.title: Selena Quintanilla’s Birthday
holidays.description: She ranks among the most influential Latin artists and even in death, her legacy lives on.
